code: import React,{Component}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import Title from'../partials/title';import SearchInput from'../partials/search';import Group from'../partials/group';import Button from'../partials/button';export default class Maps extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={items:[],searchValue:''};}componentDidMount(){rpc.callServer('Blips-GetNames').then(items=>{this.setState(()=>({items:items.sort()}));});}async showNearestItem(name){await rpc.callServer('Blips-MarkNearest',name);this.setState(()=>({selected:name}));}getFilteredItems(){const{items,searchValue}=this.state;return items.filter(item=>item.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchValue.toLowerCase())!==-1);}render(){const{searchValue,selected}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"maps"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"maps_header"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Title,null,"\u0421\u043F\u0438\u0441\u043E\u043A \u043C\u0456\u0441\u0446\u044C"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(SearchInput,{placeholder:"\u041F\u043E\u0438\u0441\u043A",value:searchValue,onChange:value=>this.setState(()=>({searchValue:value}))})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Group,{className:"maps_list"},this.getFilteredItems().map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{icon:selected===item?'check':undefined,key:index,onClick:this.showNearestItem.bind(this,item)},item))));}}
